name: They Are The Heros
description:
They Are The Heros

Create your own Hero-partie. Compete against other parties around the world. Roll random Hero Crads or Create your own Heros. You can arrange your partie up to 5 Heros. With your partie you can fight against other Hero-parties to get to the top of the leaderboard.

Short explanation of the features (you can read all this also ingame, at the [?] button):

Create Hero:

Here you can create your on Hero for 1000 coins

Roll Hero:

Here you can roll a random Hero for 50 coins (There is a 5% chance
to get a shiny Hero, who is stronger)

Questing:

While this window is open, you gain 10 coins each 10 seconds

Fighting:

Here you will be presented with other parties from all over the
world. You can fight against them to earn a lot of money. However
you can also lose money

Manage:

Here you can arrange your Partie. You see all your rolled and
created Heros, sorted by atk. You just need to drag them to the +
button at the top to add them to your partie

Leaderboard:

Here you can see the best player in the world, sorted by level or
coins

Full code of the game at Github
